title: Vue
description: Vue.js is an open-source JavaScript framework for creating user interfaces (UI).  It is component-based, which makes it easy to create and maintain complex interfaces.  Vue.js is a great choice for developers looking for a quick and easy way to create high-quality user interfaces.  It is easy to learn and use, and has a large community of developers who create modules and libraries to extend its functionality.
author: IA Bard

title: React
description: React is a JavaScript framework for building user interfaces. It is based on components and is known for its performance and scalability. React is used by major companies such as Facebook, Instagram, Netflix, and Microsoft
author: IA Bard

title: Angular
description: Angular is an open-source JavaScript framework for building web applications. It is based on components and is known for its productivity and compatibility with TypeScript. Angular is used by major companies such as Google, Microsoft, Upwork, PayPal, eBay, Nike, and Coca-Cola
author: IA Bard
